name: 1to1Tutor.org - California
tag_list: online-geometry-tutor, geometry-tutor-online, geometry-tutoring-online, online-geometry-tutoring, statistics-tutor, online-calculus-tutor, online-calculus-tutoring, math-tutoring-online, online-math-tutoring, online-math-tutor
overview: 1toTutor.org located in California has been organized exclusively for educational purposes since 2005 and has worked with over 500 schools districts. The site’s motto is to use online education as tool for disseminating quality education among people of all ages, thereby harnessing their learning potential. We have got an easy step-by-step process for you to get started from home at any time slot convenient for you. We have an easy online process to register and you may choose an appropriate program as per your need and budget. 1to1Tutor.org employs full-time highly skilled and trained teachers who cater to students of different abilities, making sure the latter’s needs are met with. We use the latest technology for tutoring like the interactive Whiteboard tool, interactive chat rooms and an e-mail and message board. In California our services are 24/7, so you can choose a time slot most convenient to you.
